thread.section_title: Songfinch Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Songfinch | songfinch.com
thread.title: Gary

author: Gary
title: Gary
text:
I was uncertain how a stranger might craft a song based on my emailing of assorted facts, but Songfinch and its stable of writers did a fantastic job! Well worth the money. For most of us, music has an emotional hook that resonates more deeply than other mediums. To be able to tap into that was invaluable to me.
Give them a try! It's unlike any other gift you can give yourself or a friend.
